03.22.2020

#3 — Remote Teaching I

About

Most likely, if you’re a design educator, your classes are moving online and you’ve had to drastically shift how you think about conducting your class. We thought we could use the next Salon** to have an open session to share how everyone is approaching it, any concerns or questions people needed feedback on, and generally see some friendly faces during a stressful time.

 #2 — Collaboration #4 — Remote Teaching II 

Email list sign up

What is the number one benefit of signing up you ask? Early access to event registration!

**

What is Sunday Salon? In case you’re unfamiliar, Sunday Salon is a monthly(-ish) gathering of designer-educator-researchers that takes place on the internet. It is a project of Adjunct and started in 2019.
